properties.entry: INSERT INTO Amenity (ProviderTypeId, Name, Type, Remarks, CreatedBy, CreatedOn, UpdatedBy, UpdatedOn) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
UPDATE Amenity SET ProviderTypeId = ?, Name = ?, Type = ?, Remarks = ?, UpdatedBy = ?, UpdatedOn = ? WHERE Id = ?

SELECT Amenity.Id, Amenity.ProviderTypeId, Amenity.Name, Amenity.Type, Amenity.Remarks, ProviderType.Name AS ProviderTypeName FROM Amenity LEFT OUTER JOIN ProviderType ON ProviderType.Id = Amenity.ProviderTypeId WHERE Amenity.Id = ?
